mapper.select: SELECT id, parentId, districtId, title, contents, fee, startDate, endDate, registerDate, dueDate, isFinished FROM posts WHERE id = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (id, parentId, districtId, title, contents, fee, startDate, endDate, registerDate, dueDate, isFinished ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{districtId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{fee}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, Now(), #{dueDate}, 'N' )
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET districtId = #{districtId}, title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, fee = #{fee}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, dueDate = #{dueDate}, isFinished = #{isFinished} WHERE id = #{id}
